data: Murdo MacFarlane, the Hudson’s Bay Company’s trader at Lashing Water post, laid aside his book and glanced across the stove at his wife who had paused in her sewing to hold up for inspection a very tiny shirt of soft wool.
Hudson’s Bay Company | Lashing Water post

Murdo MacFarlane, the Hudson's Bay Company's trader at Lashing Water post, laid aside his book and glanced across the stove at his wife who had paused in her sewing to hold up for inspection a very tiny shirt of soft wool.
Snowdrift: A Story of the Land of the Strong Cold
